meta.title: Golden Retriever Cost in Miami, FL (2025 Price Guide)
meta.description: Complete breakdown of Golden Retriever costs in Miami. Puppy prices, vet bills, grooming, and monthly expenses for Miami dog owners.

h1: How Much Does a Golden Retriever Cost in Miami?
local_insights: Heartworm prevention is critical in Miami year-round, adding to monthly costs.
Grooming is essential due to humidity and heat.
Vet costs are moderately high compared to rural Florida.

monetization.insurance_cta: Get a quote for Miami Pet Insurance
